summary: This is an internal email from October 5, 2020, forwarding a New York Post article about a new accuser alleging Ghislaine Maxwell gagged and raped her. The sender notes they are reading it 'with a heavy grain of salt given source' but is passing it on.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named in the forwarded article as the subject of a new accusation of gagging and raping a woman.

events.title: NY Post publishes new accuser allegation
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article where a NYC woman alleges Ghislaine Maxwell gagged and raped her.

keyFacts: An internal email from October 5, 2020, forwards a news article about a new accuser.
The forwarded New York Post article, dated October 4, 2020, contains an allegation from a NYC woman that Ghislaine Maxwell gagged and raped her.
The email sender expresses skepticism, stating they are reading the article 'with a heavy grain of salt given source'.
